To evaluate safety tolerability sunitinib ( Sutent ) administer patient high-risk superficial TCC bladder fail previous intravesical BCG . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate effect Sunitinib ( Sutent ) immunosuppressive regulatory T cell ( Tregs ) . III . To determine presence circulate tumor cell superficial BCG-refractory TCC patient . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically .
